ingredients.ingredient: 1 (17.3 ounce) package frozen puff pastry (such as Pepperidge Farm®), thawed
1 (3.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix
½ (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
1 tablespoon confectioners' sugar for dusting, or to taste

cookingTips: Thaw puff pastry at room temperature for 40 minutes before unfolding to prevent cracking
Whip pudding just until thick—overwhipping will deflate the mousse-like texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide me through making light, airy chocolate clouds with crispy pastry and creamy chocolate filling.
